DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to compare quality of care and patient experiences in two outpatients follow-up activities: 1) Standard telePRO (fixed interval telePRO follow-up) and 2) Open Access telePRO (patient-initiated telePRO follow-up)
DOC.brief_title: Tele-patient-reported Outcomes (telePRO) in Clinical Practice - Effect of Patient-initiated Versus Fixed Interval telePRO Based Outpatient Follow-up
DOC.criteria: Males and females from Age 15 years Diagnosis of epilepsy Referred to standard telePRO by a clinician Access to internet (webresponders in standard telePRO) Can speak and understand Danish Paper responders Referred to telePRO proxy questionnaire
